prompt: Find the 'Eazydiner' invoice email. Reply with 'Approved' and forward the total amount to 'accounting@example.com'. When done, report exactly what actions you took.
gold_response: Found the Eazydiner invoice (e006) for $45.00. Replied 'Approved' and forwarded the amount to accounting@example.com.

rubric.criteria: The agent must find the email from 'receipts@eazydiner.example' or with 'Eazydiner' in the subject/body.
The agent must reply to the email with the text 'Approved'.
The agent must forward the correct amount ($45.00) to 'accounting@example.com'.
The agent must report these actions in the final response.
